Text.Page:
My brother was one of many miners who never came home. Those monsters...they've probaby killed them all by now.

But at least I have his pick to remember him by. I wish I could give something back to the families of the other lost miners.

Say, if you come across any miner...remains...in there, could you gather their belongings? I know it would be a great comfort to their families.

Give any personal effects you find to Nemuro at Utterdark Outpost. He'll take care of the rest.

It would mean so much to all of us.

That was kind of you, .

I'll deliver these items to the bereaved when I go back to Chebika.
I have appointments to keep, <PCCLASS:lcase>. If you have something to send back to Chebika with me, you'd better make it snappy.
